languages.text: Джай уверена, что астропатическое сообщение с угрозами отправил ее извечный конкурент в хладном торге — капер Фалько. Лишь прибыв на Футфол лично, Вольный Торговец сможет разобраться в ситуации.

traits.locale_text: Джай уверена, что астропатическое сообщение с угрозами отправил ее извечный конкурент в хладном торге — капер Фалько. Лишь прибыв на Футфол лично, Вольный Торговец сможет разобраться в ситуации.

languages.text: Jae is convinced that the threatening Astropathic message was sent by her old rival in the Cold Trade, a privateer by the name of Falco. Only by going to Footfall in person can the Rogue Trader get to the bottom of this situation.
languages.original_text: Джай уверена, что астропатическое сообщение с угрозами отправил ее извечный конкурент в хладном торге — капер Фалько. Лишь прибыв на Футфол лично, Вольный Торговец сможет разобраться в ситуации.

traits.locale_text: Jae is convinced that the threatening Astropathic message was sent by her old competitor in the Cold Trader, a privateer by the name of Falco. Only by coming to Footfall in person can the Rogue Trader get to the bottom of this situation.

Jae is convinced that the threatening Astropathic message was sent by her old competitor in the Cold Trader, a privateer by the name of Falco. Only by coming to Footfall in person can the Rogue Trader get to the bottom of this situation.

Jae is convinced that the threatening astropathic message was sent by her old rival in the Cold Trade, a privateer by the name of Falco. Only by going to Footfall in person can the Rogue Trader get to the bottom of this situation.

Jae is convinced that the threatening Astropathic message was sent by her old rival in the Cold Trade, a privateer by the name of Falco. Only by going to Footfall in person can the Rogue Trader get to the bottom of this situation.

languages.text: Jae est convaincue que le message astropathique menaçant lui a été envoyé par son vieux rival du Commerce Froid, un corsaire du nom de Falco. Pour faire la lumière sur cette affaire, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit se rendre à Castel en personne.
languages.original_text: Jae is convinced that the threatening Astropathic message was sent by her old rival in the Cold Trade, a privateer by the name of Falco. Only by going to Footfall in person can the Rogue Trader get to the bottom of this situation.

traits.locale_text: Jae est convaincue que le message astropathique menaçant lui a été envoyé par son vieux rival du Commerce Froid, un corsaire du nom de Falco. Pour faire la lumière sur cette affaire, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit se rendre à Castel en personne.

languages.text: 婕伊非常确信，这条充满威胁意味的星语信息来自她在冷市贸易的老对手，一个名叫法尔科的私掠者。行商浪人需要亲自前往落脚港，弄清到底发生了什么事情。
languages.original_text: Jae is convinced that the threatening Astropathic message was sent by her old rival in the Cold Trade, a privateer by the name of Falco. Only by going to Footfall in person can the Rogue Trader get to the bottom of this situation.

traits.locale_text: 婕伊非常确信，这条充满威胁意味的星语信息来自她在冷市贸易的老对手，一个名叫法尔科的私掠者。行商浪人需要亲自前往落脚港，弄清到底发生了什么事情。

languages.text: ジェイは、その脅迫的な感応通信メッセージが、闇取引によってかつての宿敵、ファルコという名の私掠船から送られたものだと確信している。自由開拓者がこの状況の真相を突き止めるには、フットフォールに直接赴くしかない。
languages.original_text: Jae is convinced that the threatening Astropathic message was sent by her old rival in the Cold Trade, a privateer by the name of Falco. Only by going to Footfall in person can the Rogue Trader get to the bottom of this situation.

traits.locale_text: ジェイは、その脅迫的な感応通信メッセージが、闇取引によってかつての宿敵、ファルコという名の私掠船から送られたものだと確信している。自由開拓者がこの状況の真相を突き止めるには、フットフォールに直接赴くしかない。

languages.text: Jae ist überzeugt, dass die bedrohliche astropathische Nachricht von ihrem alten Rivalen beim Kalthandel stammt, einem Freibeuter namens Falco. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} kann dieser Situation nur auf den Grund gehen, indem {mf|er|sie} persönlich nach Footfall reist.
languages.original_text: Jae is convinced that the threatening Astropathic message was sent by her old rival in the Cold Trade, a privateer by the name of Falco. Only by going to Footfall in person can the Rogue Trader get to the bottom of this situation.

traits.locale_text: Jae ist überzeugt, dass die bedrohliche astropathische Nachricht von ihrem alten Rivalen beim Kalthandel stammt, einem Freibeuter namens Falco. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} kann dieser Situation nur auf den Grund gehen, indem {mf|er|sie} persönlich nach Footfall reist.

languages.text: Jae está convencida de que el amenazador mensaje Astropático viene de su antiguo rival del Comercio Frío, un corsario conocido como Falco. Para llegar al fondo del asunto, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente tendrá que acudir personalmente a Paso.
languages.original_text: Jae is convinced that the threatening Astropathic message was sent by her old rival in the Cold Trade, a privateer by the name of Falco. Only by going to Footfall in person can the Rogue Trader get to the bottom of this situation.

traits.locale_text: Jae está convencida de que el amenazador mensaje Astropático viene de su antiguo rival del Comercio Frío, un corsario conocido como Falco. Para llegar al fondo del asunto, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente tendrá que acudir personalmente a Paso.

languages.text: Jae, tehdit içeren Astropatik mesajın Soğuk Ticaret'teki eski rakibi Falco adındaki bir izinli korsan tarafından gönderildiğini düşünüyor. Hür Tacir, bu işin aslını sadece Binliman'a bizzat giderek öğrenebilir.
languages.original_text: Jae is convinced that the threatening Astropathic message was sent by her old rival in the Cold Trade, a privateer by the name of Falco. Only by going to Footfall in person can the Rogue Trader get to the bottom of this situation.
